education: Msc – Information Technology from Dhirubhai Ambani University (2025 - Present); BCA from Asia Paciﬁc BCA College (2022 - 2025); 12th from Ankur High School (2021 - 2022).
experience_summary: Founder and Full-Stack Developer at BiteCodes, leading a software outsourcing startup and delivering end-to-end web solutions using Spring Boot, React, MySQL, and Docker. Previous experience includes working as a Java Developer at Concept Serve Technologies, creating APIs and microservices, and an internship as a Django Intern at BrainyBeam Technologies. Also worked as a Healthcare Recruiter.
